name: Moderate Urban System
description: A middle-tier healthcare system in urban settings with reasonable infrastructure. Represents typical urban healthcare in middle-income countries.
system_description: Features 65% initial formal care seeking and 25% transition from informal to formal care. Has standard mortality rates across all levels of care, with balanced referral patterns. Per diem costs range from $7 (informal) to $350 (tertiary).
ai_interventions_impact: AI interventions have standard effectiveness in this balanced system.

name: Weak Rural System
description: Limited healthcare capacity in rural areas with poor access. Significant challenges in healthcare delivery and outcomes.
system_description: Only 30% of patients initially seek formal care, and just 10% transition from informal to formal care later. Features 40% higher untreated rates, significantly reduced resolution rates (40-50% below standard), and 50-100% higher mortality rates.
ai_interventions_impact: AI interventions can be transformative but face implementation challenges due to infrastructure limitations.

name: Strong Urban System LMIC
description: An aspirational high-quality system in lower/middle-income urban areas. Represents best-in-class urban healthcare in developing countries.
system_description: High initial formal care seeking (80%) and good transition from informal care (35%). Features 20-30% better resolution rates and 20-40% lower mortality compared to baseline. Has efficient referral pathways and higher quality infrastructure.
ai_interventions_impact: AI interventions can be highly effective and well-integrated into existing digital systems.

name: Fragile Conflict System
description: Severely compromised healthcare in humanitarian crisis or conflict zones. Extremely challenging healthcare delivery environment.
system_description: Extremely limited access (only 20% seek formal care) with 60% remaining completely untreated. Resolution effectiveness is reduced by 40-70% with mortality 50-150% higher than normal. Referral pathways are broken (60-80% reduced).
ai_interventions_impact: AI interventions face significant implementation barriers but can provide critical decision support where healthcare workers are overwhelmed.

name: High Income System
description: World-class healthcare in wealthy nations with nearly universal access. Represents healthcare systems in developed countries.
system_description: Features 90% formal care seeking and 70% transition from informal to formal care. Has 50-70% better resolution rates and 50-70% lower mortality compared to standard. Very efficient referral patterns but substantially higher costs ($15-1200 per day).
ai_interventions_impact: AI interventions can be seamlessly integrated but may show less dramatic improvements due to already high baseline performance.
